=====================================================================
External code license reference for any suffixed single header files 
cmp_.h included in release.
======================================================================

rgbcx 
--------
https://github.com/richgel999/bc7enc_rdo

betsy
-------
https://github.com/darksylinc/betsy

humus
---------
http://www.humus.name/index.php?page=3D&ID=79

gpurealtimebc6h
-----------------------
https://github.com/knarkowicz/GPURealTimeBC6H

int & icmp
----------
https://github.com/GameTechDev/ISPCTextureCompressor

stb
----
https://github.com/nothings/stb/blob/master/stb_dxt.h

directx
---------
https://github.com/microsoft/DirectXTex

icbc
------
https://github.com/castano/icbc

squish
---------
https://code.google.com/archive/p/libsquish

nv
---
https://github.com/castano/nvidia-texture-tools

volt
-----
https://github.com/volition-inc/bc7_gpu/
